flawed_nl_solution:
She has 240 minutes to write because 4 x 60 = <<4*60=240>>240
She will write 2400 words because 240 x 10 = <<240*10=2400>>2400
She will earn $204 for the words because 2400 x 0.1 = <<2400*0.1=204>>204
She will earn $180 from the articles because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=180>>180
She will earn $384 in total because 204 + 180 = <<204+180=384>>384
She will average $96 an hour because 384 / 4 = <<384/4=96>>96
#### 96

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 240, not 204. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
